body:
Hi Khalid,


Can you tell me more about your setup? OpenStudio version, EnergyPlus version, how is Radiance installed, and what error(s) you are experiencing?


Rob Guglielmetti
National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL)
Commercial Buildings Research Group
15013 Denver West Parkway MS:RSF202
Golden, CO 80401
303.275.4319
robert.guglielmetti at nrel.gov

Hi, Martin
I’m facing the same problem. I did try to do the simulation through simulation, however I did not succeed.
I just want to know whether you manage to solve the problem or not.


Thanks




Khalid
